text: The Immortal is an American television series. It's about a man who has blood that can guard against diseases. This makes him almost unable to die. It was shown on ABC from September 24, 1970 to January 14, 1971. ==Episode list== Title Original air date ==DVD release== On October 16, 2017, Visual Entertainment got the rights to the series. They then released The Immortal - 'The Complete Collection' on DVD in Region 1 on November 9, 2017. ==References== Category:English-language television programs Category:1970s American television series
title: The Immortal (1970 TV series)
